      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Shell.Builder addCommand(java.util.List<java.lang.String> commands)
      Add commands to execute
      Shell.Builder addCommand(java.util.List<java.lang.String> commands, int code, Shell.OnCommandResultListener onCommandResultListener)
      Add commands to execute, with a callback to be called on completion (of all commands) The thread on which the callback executes is dependent on various factors, see Shell.Interactive for further details

      Add a command to execute

      • addCommand

        public Shell.Builder addCommand(java.lang.String command,
                                int code,
                                Shell.OnCommandResultListener onCommandResultListener)

        Add a command to execute, with a callback to be called on completion

        The thread on which the callback executes is dependent on various factors, see Shell.Interactive for further details

        参数:
        command - Command to execute
        code - User-defined value passed back to the callback
        onCommandResultListener - Callback to be called on completion
        返回:
        This Builder object for method chaining

      • addCommand

        Add commands to execute
        参数:
        commands - Commands to execute
        返回:
        This Builder object for method chaining

      • addCommand

        public Shell.Builder addCommand(java.util.List<java.lang.String> commands,
                                int code,
                                Shell.OnCommandResultListener onCommandResultListener)

        Add commands to execute, with a callback to be called on completion (of all commands)

        The thread on which the callback executes is dependent on various factors, see Shell.Interactive for further details

        参数:
        commands - Commands to execute
        code - User-defined value passed back to the callback
        onCommandResultListener - Callback to be called on completion (of all commands)
        返回:
        This Builder object for method chaining

      • addCommand

        参数:
        commands - Commands to execute
        返回:
        This Builder object for method chaining

      • addCommand

        public Shell.Builder addCommand(java.lang.String[] commands,
                                int code,
                                Shell.OnCommandResultListener onCommandResultListener)

        Add commands to execute, with a callback to be called on completion (of all commands)

        The thread on which the callback executes is dependent on various factors, see Shell.Interactive for further details

        参数:
        commands - Commands to execute
        code - User-defined value passed back to the callback
        onCommandResultListener - Callback to be called on completion (of all commands)
        返回:
        This Builder object for method chaining

      • setOnSTDOUTLineListener

        public Shell.Builder setOnSTDOUTLineListener(StreamGobbler.OnLineListener onLineListener)

        Set a callback called for every line output to STDOUT by the shell

        The thread on which the callback executes is dependent on various factors, see Shell.Interactive for further details

        参数:
        onLineListener - Callback to be called for each line
        返回:
        This Builder object for method chaining

      • setOnSTDERRLineListener

        public Shell.Builder setOnSTDERRLineListener(StreamGobbler.OnLineListener onLineListener)

        Set a callback called for every line output to STDERR by the shell

        The thread on which the callback executes is dependent on various factors, see Shell.Interactive for further details

        参数:
        onLineListener - Callback to be called for each line
        返回:
        This Builder object for method chaining

      • setWatchdogTimeout

        public Shell.Builder setWatchdogTimeout(int watchdogTimeout)

        Enable command timeout callback

        This will invoke the onCommandResult() callback with exitCode WATCHDOG_EXIT if a command takes longer than watchdogTimeout seconds to complete.

        If a watchdog timeout occurs, it generally means that the Interactive session is out of sync with the shell process. The caller should close the current session and open a new one.

        参数:
        watchdogTimeout - Timeout, in seconds; 0 to disable
        返回:
        This Builder object for method chaining

      • setMinimalLogging

        public Shell.Builder setMinimalLogging(boolean useMinimal)

        Enable/disable reduced logcat output

        Note that this is a global setting

        参数:
        useMinimal - true for reduced output, false for full output
        返回:
        This Builder object for method chaining

      • open

        public Shell.Interactive open()
        Construct a Shell.Interactive instance, and start the shell
        返回:
        Interactive shell

      • open

        public Shell.Interactive open(Shell.OnCommandResultListener onCommandResultListener)
        Construct a Shell.Interactive instance, try to start the shell, and call onCommandResultListener to report success or failure
        参数:
        onCommandResultListener - Callback to return shell open status
        返回:
        Interactive shell
